long_description: Say goodbye to sore, numb hands and hello to soothing relief-WTB doesn't call these the Comfort Zone grips for nothing. Precision ergonomic fit provides increased control. Angle of support is easily adjustable for optimum comfort. Clamps-On technology means these grips go on easily and hold tight to handlebars. Triple rubber compound is long lasting. Includes end caps.
short_description: Say goodbye to sore, numb hands and hello to soothing relief-WTB doesn't call these the Comfort Zone grips for nothing.
